name: Why did the chicken cross the road (Gr8bitgames)
name_original: Why did the chicken cross the road (Gr8bitgames)
description:
A short story about a chicken embarking on a perilous journey.

Made for the ShortStory Jam, I am still currently working on this game and will be bringing out a second official version called Why did the chicken cross the road.
The coming version may likely be level based and provide different game modes such as Survival.
CONTROLS: Move with the arrow keys.


Why did the chicken cross the road?
A second version to the game just recently finished. This version is a survival type game where you attempt to cross the road multiple times to build a highscore.
Each directional arrow key will only move you one direction as your chicken automatically faces the direction to go, so this game is more of a test of your timing skills.

Lots more to come in the future with this game so stay tuned :D
